problem: How do I prioritize what to build?

solutions.speaker: Marty Cagan
solutions.insight: Focus on the outcomes you want to achieve, not just shipping features. The best teams start with the customer problem and work backwards.

solutions.speaker: Richard Rumelt
solutions.speaker_role: of people out there willing to sell you advice on mission and your vision and your values,
solutions.insight: Good strategy is about focusing on what truly matters. You can't do everything, so be clear about your constraints and priorities.
